meanings.definition: The foundation or base upon which railroad tracks are laid.
meanings.sent1: The railbeds provide support for the train tracks.
meanings.sent2: The workers inspected the railbeds for any signs of damage.
meanings.sent3: I dreamt of a world where the railbeds were made of candy.
meanings.sent4: The history of the town is intertwined with the railbeds that run through it.
meanings.sent5: The sun cast long shadows over the railbeds as the train approached.

meanings.definition: The area of land where railroad tracks are located.
meanings.sent1: The lush greenery surrounded the railbeds on both sides.
meanings.sent2: The railbeds stretched out for miles across the countryside.
meanings.sent3: The animals in the forest loved to play near the railbeds.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts traveled along the railbeds of memories past.
meanings.sent5: The railbeds echoed with the sound of the approaching train.

meanings.definition: The surface on which railroad tracks are built.
meanings.sent1: The maintenance crew worked tirelessly to keep the railbeds smooth.
meanings.sent2: The rain had washed away some of the gravel on the railbeds.
meanings.sent3: The children raced toy trains along the railbeds in the park.
meanings.sent4: The railbeds gleamed in the sunlight after being freshly polished.
meanings.sent5: The vibrations from the passing train could be felt through the railbeds.
